name: Dots (itch) (james)
description:
Controls
move: arrow keys 
jump: z

A Commodore 64 platformer made in 4kb for the 2020 4k Craptastic comp.

All entries can be found here:

https://reset64-magazine.itch.io/2020-reset64-4kb-craptastic-game-compo
